title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-8.3 - Leave records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-8.3 - Leave records

State Regulations

If leave accrues to employees by resolution of the
local agency, approved by the division, a record of such leave shall be
maintained for each employee. Charges to accrued leave shall be posted to these
records and the balance available to the employee shall be
indicated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1642-8.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
